segments.text: What sort of shift-system do you operate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a three-shift system - that's three eight-hour shifts each weekday . We're shut at weekends . This week I'm on the early shift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you ever have to do the night shift ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sometimes . I don't like working nights I have problems sleeping during the day .
segments.speaker: S2
